params._nodeAddress: Address of the node that will own the batch
params._owner: Address that pays for the batch, but not the owner of the batch

returns._0: Array of BatchInfo for the owner

params._batchId: The id of the batch to increase depth
params._newDepth: The new depth for the batch (must be greater than current depth)

params._batchId: Batch ID from the old contract
params._bucketDepth: Bucket depth from the old batch
params._immutable: Immutable flag from the old batch
params._nodeAddress: Node address from the old batch
params._normalisedBalance: Normalised balance from the old batch
params._timestamp: Original timestamp from the old batch
params._totalAmount: Total amount from the old batch

params._batchId: The id of the batch to top up
params._topupAmountPerChunk: The amount of additional tokens to add per chunk

params._newAdmin: The address of the new admin

params._newSwarmContractAddress: New address of the swarm contract

createBatchRegistry(address,address,uint.notice: Creates a new batch and registers the payer

getBatchPayer(bytes32).notice: Get the payer address for a specific batch ID

getOwnerBatchCount(address).notice: Get the number of batches for a specific owner

getOwnerBatches(address).notice: Get all batches for a specific owner

increaseBatchDepth(bytes32,uint8).notice: Increase the depth of an existing batch

migrateBatchRegistry(address,bytes32,uin.notice: Migrate batch data from old contract without performing token transfers

transferAdmin(address).notice: Transfer admin rights to a new address
